movies.title: Iron Man
movies.description: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

movies.title: Iron Man 2
movies.description: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.

movies.title: Black Adam
movies.description: Nearly 5,000 years after he was bestowed with the almighty powers of the Egyptian gods--and imprisoned just as quickly--Black Adam is freed from his earthly tomb, ready to unleash his unique form of justice on the modern world.

movies.title: Thor
movies.description: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
movies.description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth ...

movies.title: Spider Man: Lost Cause
movies.description: Peter Parker a lone child discovers that his parents were in a horrifying plot to make mankind change. getting bitten by his fathers invention he develops super powers to tries to find answers to his whole life, try and juggle a r...

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

movies.title: Oppenheimer
movies.description: The story of American scientist, J. Robert Oppenheimer, and his role in the development of the atomic bomb.

movies.title: Liga
movies.description: Pisti calls upon a meeting with the 'League', because Kati's scooter disappeared. The four kids start the investigation in their DIY superhero costumes, but the action goes wrong. Pisti has multiple missions: finding the scooter, ...

movies.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
movies.description: When a woman's long-time friend reveals he's engaged, she realizes she loves him herself and sets out to get him, with only days before the wedding.

movies.title: Life
movies.description: A team of scientists aboard the International Space Station discover a rapidly evolving life form that caused extinction on Mars and now threatens all life on Earth.

movies.title: Some Like It Hot
movies.description: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

movies.title: After
movies.description: A young woman falls for a guy with a dark secret and the two embark on a rocky relationship. Based on the novel by Anna Todd.

movies.title: Hello World
movies.description: A man travels in time from the year 2027 to relive his school years and to correct a bad decision.

movies.title: Love
movies.description: Murphy is an American living in Paris who enters a highly sexually and emotionally charged relationship with Electra. Unaware of the effect it will have on their relationship, they invite their pretty neighbor into their bed.

movies.title: Happy Feet
movies.director: George Miller, Warren Coleman, Judy Morris
movies.description: Into the world of the Emperor Penguins, who find their soul mates through song, a penguin is born who cannot sing. But he can tap dance something fierce!

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope

movies.title: Happy Life
movies.description: New York Tunez, an all techno record store, is going under. The owner, Keith, a down and out trance DJ, struggles to cope with the changing cultural climate. In a final effort to save the store he organizes a rave. Unfortunately, ...

movies.title: Frances Ha
movies.description: A New York woman apprentices for a dance company and throws herself headlong into her dreams, even as the possibility of realizing them dwindles.

movies.title: Home
movies.description: An alien on the run from his own people makes friends with a girl. He tries to help her on her quest, but can be an interference.

movies.title: Ratatouille
movies.description: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.

movies.title: Tom and Jerry
movies.description: A weekly Saturday (later Sunday) Morning repackaged compilation with new wraparounds featuring two Tom and Jerry cartoons sandwiching other MGM animated theatrical shorts.

movies.title: The Last Dance
movies.description: Charting the rise of the 1990s Chicago Bulls, led by Michael Jordan, one of the most notable dynasties in sports history.

movies.title: Oppenheimer
movies.description: The story of American scientist, J. Robert Oppenheimer, and his role in the development of the atomic bomb.

movies.title: Lost series
movies.description: The survivors of a plane crash are forced to work together in order to survive on a seemingly deserted tropical island.
